https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1Iu9cBVGd9YygoRAMw0Vx5OMqCH.jpg The murder of an actress prompts an illogical, circular phone conversation between a detective in Cape Town and a movie director in Los Angeles. 'Century City' is shown in galleries as a dual-screen installation. It is a circular narrative, running on a continuous loop. Century City
